level.heading: BENEFITS AVAILABLE FOR BURIAL AND CREMATION (ยง 29-2603)

level.text: When a deceased person meets the eligibility criteria described in section 2602 and an application has been filed and approved as required under section 2601, one (1) of the following shall occur:
Eight hundred dollars ($ 800) shall be paid for burial assistance; or
Four hundred and fifty dollars ($ 450) shall be paid for cremation assistance.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 37 DCR 657, 659 (January 19, 1990); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 38 DCR 6776 (November 8, 1991); as amended by Emergency Rulemaking at 51 DCR 3327 (March 26, 2004) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 5211 (May 21, 2004).

level.heading: EDITOR’S NOTE
level.text: D.C. Code, 2001 Ed. ยง4 1231 (formerly codified as D.C. Code, 1981 Ed. ยง3 1031) was repealed by D.C. Law 12 241 ยง7, 46 DCR 905 (April 20, 1999).
